Room.Name: Left Platform
Room.ShortDescription: You are clinging to the left platform, high above the tigers in the Carnival.
Room.LongDescription: Sitting high above the tigers, the view from here is extraordinary. You can see just about everywhere, although everything looks so small. The only exits are back to the highwire and, heaven forbid, down. It looks like you could just about miss the cage directly below if you jumped out far enough.
